data: The organization Global Education Fund operates as an educational nonprofit institution.
The organization Global Education Fund supports access to schooling for underprivileged children worldwide.
The organization Global Education Fund has a mission to bridge the education gap through scholarships and community programs.
The organization Global Education Fund adheres to values of Equity, Integrity, and Empowerment.
The organization Global Education Fund was founded in 2005 and has funded over 10,000 students in 25 countries.
The organization Global Education Fund is based in New York, NY, USA.
